titleStmt.title: If love's a sweet passion, &c. or, The passionate lover: When love and beauty doth agree, it is the best of company. Sung with its own proper tune.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
First line: "If love's a sweet passion, why doth it torment."
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
